Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans Pelicans and Atlanta Hawks will face off in a non-conference matchup on November 4, 2024.
New Orleans Pelicans had a 49-33 overall record with a 21-19 home record during the 2023-24 season.
The Pelicans averaged 115.1 points per game last season, including 51.3 points in the paint, 17.6 points off turnovers, and 15.1 points on fast breaks.
Atlanta Hawks had a 36-46 overall record with a 15-26 road record during the 2023-24 season.
The Hawks averaged 118.3 points per game last season, including 18.5 points from the free-throw line and 41.1 points from deep.
Key injuries for the Pelicans include Trey Murphy III (hamstring), CJ McCollum (adductor), and Herbert Jones (shoulder).
Key injuries for the Hawks include De'Andre Hunter (knee), Bogdan Bogdanovic (hamstring), Kobe Bufkin (shoulder), Cody Zeller (personal), Dyson Daniels (hip), and Vit Krejci (adductor).
